contentHeader.name: Codesys Code Execution Speed Tests
contentHeader.author: Toni Kucic
contentHeader.Comment: A collection of programs that measure various execution speeds of code.

ProjectInformation.property: A collection of programs that measure various execution speeds of code.

ST.xhtml: addTwoInts := int1 + int2;
addTwoNumbers := int1 + int2;
addTwoIntsST := int1 + int2;
checkBit_bitmask := (bits AND SHL(1, bitToCheck)) <> 0;
bits := bits OR SHL(UINT#1, bitToSet);
bits := bits AND NOT SHL(UINT#1, bitToClear-1);
